name: Graywise
goal: Provide consultancy services related to governance, social responsibility and compliance issues including analysis, research, public affairs, monitoring, representation, presentations, event organising, education and training
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: Consumer Policy, Better Regulation, AVMSD, UCPD, MACD, e-privacy, e-commerce, data protection, internal market, marketing communications, digital single market, media literacy, self and co-regulation, Community of Practice on self and co-regulation, copyright, safer internet, online behavioural advertising, Environment, environmental claims, cosmetics, consumer rights
